data.prayer: Father, we rejoice that you who began a good work in the church of Lake Victoria, Uganda will carry it on to completion until the day of Jesus Christ!
data.verse: being confident of this, that he who began a good work in you will carry it on to completion until the day of Christ Jesus.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Lake Victoria, Uganda

data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Lake Victoria.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.section_summary: On average, 71 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Lake Victoria, Uganda.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Father, please give the church in the state of Lake Victoria prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, disrupt complacency in the 623,358 believers living in the state of Lake Victoria. Remind them you are coming soon.
data.verse: Therefore, stay awake, for you do not know on what day your Lord is coming.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Swahili people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Swahili people know you.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Lake Victoria to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Lord, make the 623,358 believers in Lake Victoria to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 1,257,142 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 623,358 believers in Lake Victoria.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

location.name: Lake Victoria
location.people_groups_list: Kalenjin, Pokot, Kaliko, Nyang'i, Nubian, Hindi
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Kalenjin, Pokot (134,000), Kaliko (13,000), Nyang'i (18,000), Nubian (37,000), Hindi (5,800)
